name: Untitled Elf Slavery Game
description:
This is the all-ages version with no adult content.

In this game, you pillage and capture elves from their hidden villages, dodging patrols as they come by. You sell your captured elves on the open market for gold or recruit them into your own army.  

Build up your forces into a power to be reckoned with!

Shortcuts: 

[TAB] : Activate command mode
[TAB]+[E] : Command selected units towards location
[F] : Capture nearby unit
[Shift] : Sprint
